name: Black Ido
description:
Black ido is a super suit that can change gravity and protect the main character named TSK from falling from a great height.

Feature of game:
  • Adventure with the change of gravity
  • Collecting coins
  • Convenient control
  • Challenging levels
  • Physics, doors, keys and traps.

In the game you have to change the gravity and use the geometry of the level to solve puzzles.
